items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: Love this dress so much! Super flattering. So comfy, with lots of stretch. The material is so soft & silky. Color is beautiful! I love it so much that I just ordered it in black. 5'4" 130# small Read more
items.author: Greg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made
items.body: My daughter is 5'1" and approximately 135 lbs, I bought a medium. With heels on the dress fit perfectly, it wasn't too long. She looked absolutely gorgeous in it. The dress was not see through at all, made of a good quality material that did not look cheap. Would buy again. Read more
items.author: Jolynn Phillips

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mix of sexy and classy!
items.body: This dress was so perfect for my night out to watch Moulin Rouge! The dress is the right balance of sexy with classy with a nice slit and open back with straps. I normally wear a size 10-12, but bought this in a XL because I wanted it to hang nicely without being too tight around my belly. I am about 5'4" and the length was long but worked well with my 3-4" heels. If you are a bit shorter or don't wear high heels, I would recommend you size down. It's unbelievable for the price too. It came a tiny bit wrinkled but I was able to get the wrinkles out easily with the steam function on my iron. Read more
items.author: Christine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Absolutely beautiful dress!! The fabric is thick and soft! Itâ€™s stretches to fit your body just right and is formal enough to wear to a wedding! Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, comfortable, and true to size
items.body: Dress length was perfect. Iâ€™m 5â€™8 for reference. This dress was exactly as described and true to size. Very soft material not see through at all. Very stretchy. I got a ton of compliments. You definitely need this dress! Read more
items.author: Nicholas Olson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars If you are small, itâ€™s not for you.
items.body: It is a beautiful dress but it was too long on me. Iâ€™m 5.1.. it was super stretchy and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Carolina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: It is hard for me to find elegant clothing, as I am shaped like a 10 year old boy. I have a short torso and long legs so the leg slit never rests right on me. This dress fit PERFECTLY and shows off what few curves I do have. I was worried cause the models are chesty and they look very tall. Thanks to the strappy back, it is adjustable and I was able to make it tight enough in the chest area that it didnt look too big (my biggest problem with dresses and shirts) The material is nice, and its not see through at all. Read more
items.author: Ally Millisock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and quality! Just buy it! Worth every penny!
items.body: Absolutely beautiful dress for the money. Most definitely worth the buy. Looks expensive. I wore it to a wedding and received a ton of compliments. The back seam towards the bottom is weird but trust me when I say no one will be looking at that. JUST BUY IT. Read more
items.author: Danielle S

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darknavy, Red, Brown, Deep Blue, Purple, Burgundy, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
